column5: Hey fellas  Im looking for a little aluminum to tow or throw on the back of my mazda pick up. Any recommendations????    Rf
10-12' aluminum with a small outboard or electric motor?.Also depends on the waterways your planning to travel?Loads of used ones available.
how about the bass pro shops outfit. im looking at a 16 fter i would be using it on the grand down by brantford, and the waterford ponds. and the casual run to nippissing.
Watch kijiji for a 12' aluminum. I payed $200 for mine on there
I would think hard before taking that down the grand. We tried in a 10' jon from bps and it wasnt fun!
